verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hear oh Israel the Lord your God is one God, Hallelujah!
Hear oh Israel the Lord your God is one God, Hallelujah!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
And you shall love the Lord your God,
With all your heart, your soul, your might,
And give Him glory, give Him glory,
In His way delight...
